title: Sonny Boy
synopsis: Thirty-six students find themselves and their school building suddenly adrift in a void-like dimension. When supernatural powers awaken in some of them, a sense of detachment begins to divide the group. Despite the student council's attempts to impose order, they clash with the students possessing special abilities, who rebel against their strict control.
voices: ['Yuuki, Aoi', 'Ichikawa, Aoi', 'Oonishi, Saori', 'Kobayashi, Chiaki', 'Gotou, Hiroki', 'Tsuda, Kenjirou', 'Naitou, Ami', 'Taketatsu, Ayana', 'Ueda, Youji', 'Yusa, Kouji']
staff: [['Natsume, Shingo', ['Director', ' Script']], ['Hata, Shouji', ['Sound Director']], ['GING NANG BOYZ', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Eguchi, Hisashi', ['Original Character Design']]]
